18: וְעַתָּ֖ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> עֲשׂ֑וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Now then do</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[it] for the LORD</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>hath spoken</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> דָּוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בְּיַ֣ד ׀ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>By the hand</n> דָּוִ֣ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> עַבְדִּ֗י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of my servant</n> הוֹשִׁ֜יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>I will save</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּ֤י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> מִיַּ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of the hand</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וּמִיַּ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and out of the hand</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> אֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of all their enemies</n>
19: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>also spake</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אַבְנֵ֖ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>And Abner</n> בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <sup>241 </sup> <n>in the ears</n> בִנְיָמִ֑ין <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>addition</n> אַבְנֵ֗ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>and Abner</n> לְדַבֵּ֞ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>also to speak</n> בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <sup>241 </sup> <n>in the ears</n> דָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <sup>2275 </sup> <n>in Hebron</n> אֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> טוֹב֙ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> בְּעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>all that seemed</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>to Israel</n> וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and that seemed good</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to the whole house</n> בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n>
20: וַיָּבֹ֨א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אַבְנֵ֤ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>So Abner</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> דָּוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>to David</n> חֶבְר֔וֹן <sup>2275 </sup> <n>to Hebron</n> וְאִתּ֖וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>and twenty</n> אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>made</n> דָּוִ֧ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>with him And David</n> לְאַבְנֵ֛ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>Abner</n> וְלַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>and the men</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתּ֖וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> מִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <sup>4960 </sup> <n>that [were] with him a feast</n>

22: וְהִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> עַבְדֵ֨י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>And behold the servants</n> דָוִ֤ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> וְיוֹאָב֙ <sup>3097 </sup> <n>and Joab</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> מֵֽהַגְּד֔וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>from [pursuing] a troop</n> וְשָׁלָ֥ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>spoil</n> רָ֖ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>a great</n> עִמָּ֣ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הֵבִ֑יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought in</n> וְאַבְנֵ֗ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>with them but Abner</n> אֵינֶ֤נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> דָּוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[was] not with David</n> בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <sup>2275 </sup> <n>in Hebron</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שִׁלְּח֖וֹ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>for he had sent him away</n> וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>had gone</n> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n>
23: וְיוֹאָ֛ב <sup>3097 </sup> <n>When Joab</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַצָּבָ֥א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>and all the host</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אִתּ֖וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> בָּ֑אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>that [was] with him were come</n> וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>they told</n> לְיוֹאָב֙ <sup>3097 </sup> <n>Joab</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בָּֽא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אַבְנֵ֤ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>Abner</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נֵר֙ <sup>5369 </sup> <n>of Ner</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֖הוּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and he hath sent him away</n> וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>has gone</n> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n>
24: וַיָּבֹ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יוֹאָב֙ <sup>3097 </sup> <n>Then Joab</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מֶ֣ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> עָשִׂ֑יתָה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>What hast thou done</n> הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> בָ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אַבְנֵר֙ <sup>74 </sup> <n>? behold Abner</n> אֵלֶ֔יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> לָמָּה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>why</n> זֶּ֥ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>then</n> שִׁלַּחְתּ֖וֹ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>unto thee why [is] it [that] thou hast sent him away</n> וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and he is quite</n> הָלֽוֹךְ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>is already</n>

28: וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> דָּוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>when David</n> מֵאַ֣חֲרֵי <sup>310 </sup> <n>And afterward</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[it] he said</n> נָקִ֨י <sup>5355 </sup> <n>[are] guiltless</n> אָנֹכִ֧י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> וּמַמְלַכְתִּ֛י <sup>4467 </sup> <n>I and my kingdom</n> מֵעִ֥ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>before the LORD</n> עַד־ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>eternity</n> עוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n> מִדְּמֵ֖י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>from the blood</n> אַבְנֵ֥ר <sup>74 </sup> <n>of Abner</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נֵֽר׃ <sup>5369 </sup> <n>of Ner</n>
